<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scope of Truth](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1216)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 182</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Characters with access to firearms gain access to accessories that can be used with those weapons._

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** attached to firearm or crossbow (scope)

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The _scope of truth_ is a bit bigger than most to accommodate larger lenses, which have been magically prepared with tiny shards from crystal balls to reveal the truth. The scope grants you a +2 item bonus to Perception checks made to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) in areas you can see through the scope.
